mapper.select: SELECT tr.*, te.NAME, tp.POS_ID, tp.POS_NAME, tp2.PMO_ID FROM TBL_RESOURCE tr, TBL_EMP te, TBL_POS tp, TBL_PROJECT tp2 WHERE tr.EMP_ID = te.EMP_ID AND te.POS_ID = tp.POS_ID AND tr.PRJ_ID = tp2.PRJ_ID AND tr.PRJ_ID = #{projectId}

SELECT tr.EMP_ID, tr.NAME, td.DEPT_NAME, tp.POS_NAME FROM TBL_EMP tr, TBL_DEPT td, TBL_POS tp WHERE EMP_ID NOT IN (SELECT EMP_ID FROM TBL_RESOURCE tr2 WHERE prj_id = #{projectId}) AND tr.DEPT_ID = td.DEPT_ID AND tr.POS_ID = tp.POS_ID
SELECT te.emp_id, te.name FROM TBL_RESOURCE tr, TBL_EMP te, TBL_POS tp, TBL_PROJECT tp2 WHERE tr.EMP_ID = te.EMP_ID AND te.POS_ID = tp.POS_ID AND tr.PRJ_ID = tp2.PRJ_ID AND tr.PRJ_ID = #{projectId}
